GLOBAL.formulario_incompleto_descripcion: Please fill in the required fields

asignacion_fechas.sub_titulo: Module for the assignment of dates for the following processes
asignacion_fechas.alerta: Next, you must select the educational level and enter the required information about the dates.
asignacion_fechas.seleccionar_nivel_formacion: Select the level of training to assign

definicion_plantillas.alert1: Remember that you can drag the boxes of the sections or your questions.

definicion_formularios.sub_titulo: Module for the Definition of the Following Forms
definicion_formularios.alerta: Next, you will need to select the roles involved and the process, which can be Heteroevaluation, Student Self-Assessment, Peer Assessment I, Teacher Self-Assessment, or Peer Assessment II.
definicion_formularios.sin_permisos_mensaje: You do not have the necessary permissions to view this information. Please contact the system administrator for more details or to request access.

evaluaciones.sub_titulo: Module for the presentation of the following evaluations.
evaluaciones.alerta: Next, you will need to select the type of evaluation you wish to present.

definir_escalas.alerta_formulario1: Next, you must complete the multiple-choice form with a single response, assigning a numerical rating from 1 (lowest value) to 5 (highest value) to the performance of the assigned options.
definir_escalas.alerta_formulario2: Next, you must complete the form's text question, assigning an open question for an open field response.
definir_escalas.alerta_formulario3: Next, you must complete the form for the upload button's label for one or more files.
definir_escalas.alerta_formulario4: Next, you must complete the form for the download button's label for one or more files.
definir_escalas.alerta_formulario5: You will now see a list of the enabled questions for evaluations, where you can add more using the + button. You can view the question or disable it with the action column button. If disabled, it will be automatically DELETED.

heteroevaluacion.mensaje_confirmacion: You are going to proceed with the self-evaluation of the teacher {{nombre_docente}} for the subject {{nombre_asignatura}}.

autoevaluacion_i.mensaje_confirmacion: You are going to proceed with the self-evaluation of your performance for the subject {{nombre_asignatura}}.

coevaluacion_i.cronograma: Weeks 10 to 11 of the academic calendar.
coevaluacion_i.documento: Co-evaluation record of the curricular space.
coevaluacion_i.instruccion: Dear faculty and students: Please co-evaluate with mutual commitments your teaching performance and that of your students in this curricular space using the format provided for this purpose. Please upload the record resulting from this co-evaluation exercise.
coevaluacion_i.mensaje_confirmacion: You are going to proceed with the co-evaluation of: - Academic space: {{nombre_espacio}}. - Student group: {{grupo}}.

autoevaluacion_ii.espacio1: List of academic spaces associated with the teacher and the curricular project
autoevaluacion_ii.espacio2: List of academic spaces associated with the teacher and the curricular project
autoevaluacion_ii.espacioN: List of n academic spaces associated with the teacher and the curricular project
autoevaluacion_ii.mensaje_confirmacion: You are going to proceed with the self-evaluation for the curricular project {{nombre_proyecto}}.

metricas.sub_titulo: Select the period and the type of report to obtain the desired information.
metricas.seleccione_periodo_tipo: Select the period and the type of report.
metricas.seleccione_filtro_reporte: Select the filtering options you wish for the report.
metricas.mensaje_facultad: Select the level for which you want to generate the report and the filtering options by Faculty.
metricas.mensaje_global: Select the level for which you want to generate the report and the global filtering options.
